title: Drone Camera System
description: Helped develop the platform and software for a Jetson Orin Computer Vision system to detect and track airborne obstacles for a drone.
what: Design and develop a drone-mounted 180 degree camera system for the Jetson Orin NX.
Focus on detect-and-avoid functionality, long-range communication, and real-time data processing.
how: Integrated RPI HQ and Basler cameras, DLB communication modules, and custom GStreamer pipelines for efficient operation.
result: Achieved reliable detecting performance with high-quality image processing.
Enabled long-range communication up to 10 km with minimal processing overhead.
